job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} setenv STARFPE NO setenv NODEBUG yes setup gcc setup 32b starver DEV2/SL15 echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' if (! $?) then set evtsFile = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set f = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` set l = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` set chain = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $4}'` else set evtsFile = $INPUTFILE0; set f = 1 set l = 5000000 set chain = "DbV20150316 P2014a pxlHit istHit btof mtd mtdCalib BEmcChkStat CorrX OSpaceZ2 OGridLeak3D -hitfilt"; endif echo "${evtsFile}" set filel = `basename $evtsFile .daq`_${f}_${l} set output = ${filel}.event.root if (! -r ${evtsFile}) exit 1; set logFile = ${filel}B.log if ( -r $logFile) exit 0; set muFile = ${filel}.MuDst.root if (-r $muFile) exit 0; # P15ic "DbV20150316 P2014a pxlHit istHit btof mtd mtdCalib BEmcChkStat CorrX OSpaceZ2 OGridLeak3D -hitfilt" root4star -q -b 'bfc.C('$f','$l',"'${chain}'","'${evtsFile}'","'$output'")' >& ${logFile}
